thread.title: It was very nice!
thread.title_full: It was very nice! - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: caseylikesunicorns
title: It was very nice!
text:
It was lovely, nice room, lots of space with excellent staff. They made the room daily and were most polite and understanding.
We only stayed there for 2 nights but it was still a lovely stay. They gave me a kiddy pack full of toys, colouring pages and a whole pack of crayons!!! It was a AMAZING stay!!!!
Thank You for making this trip so delightful!
PS: Please eat the scones from the hotel, they are AMAZIN !!
